items.title: iPhone 上的 Apple 钱包应用现已支持添加日本的个人编号卡 (原标题: Apple Wallet App on iPhone Now Lets You Add Japan's My Number Card)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### iPhone 上的 Apple 钱包应用现已支持添加日本的个人编号卡

Apple 今日宣布，日本的个人编号卡（My Number Card）现已可添加到 iPhone 上的钱包（Wallet）应用中。

**主要特点和功能：**

*   **设备要求：** 适用于运行 iOS 18.5 或更高版本的 iPhone XS 或更新机型。
*   **添加方式：** 用户可通过最新版本的“个人编号门户”（My Number Portal）应用将卡片添加到钱包中。
*   **当前用途：**
    *   可在接受数字身份验证的场合进行实体或应用内出示。
    *   在日本的便利店打印官方文件。
    *   访问“个人编号门户”以获取在线政府服务。
*   **未来扩展：** 用户将来还可以在日本的医院和药店出示 iPhone 上的个人编号卡。
*   **重要意义：** 日本是美国以外首个支持 Apple 钱包应用身份识别功能的国家。
*   **用户规模：** Apple 表示，日本约有 1 亿人持有个人编号卡。
*   **更多信息：** 详细信息可在数字厅（Digital Agency）网站上查阅。

![Apple Wallet Japan My Number Card](https://images.macrumors.com/t/pZd27dIn_5KQo8Ml4RjUHKPQXNE=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/Apple-Wallet-Japan-My-Number-Card.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iPhone 上的 Apple 钱包应用现已支持添加日本的个人编号卡。用户可在 iPhone XS 或更新机型（iOS 18.5+）上通过“个人编号门户”应用添加。此功能允许数字出示、在便利店打印文件以及访问在线政府服务。日本是美国以外首个支持此钱包身份识别功能的国家，未来还将扩展至医疗机构。日本约有1亿个人编号卡持有者。
items.translated_title: iPhone 上的 Apple 钱包应用现已支持添加日本的个人编号卡

images.alt: Apple Wallet Japan My Number Card

items.content:
Apple today announced that Japan's My Number Card can now be added to the Wallet app on an iPhone XS or newer running iOS 18.5 or later.


The card can be added to the Wallet app via the latest version of the My Number Portal app, and it can be presented in person or in apps, where accepted digitally.

Starting today, Apple said the My Number Card on the iPhone can be used to print official documents at convenience stores in Japan, and to access the My Number Portal to receive online government services. In the future, users will also be able to present a My Number Card on the iPhone at hospitals and pharmacies in Japan.

Japan is the first country to support the Wallet app's ID feature outside of the United States.

Apple says approximately 100 million people in Japan have a My Number Card.

More details are available on the Digital Agency's website.
Tag: Apple Wallet

items.title: Mac 转向 Apple 芯片的过渡于五年前公布 (原标题: Intel to Apple Silicon Transition for Mac Was Announced Five Years Ago)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# Mac 转向 Apple 芯片：五年里程碑

五年前，苹果公司宣布了其 Mac 产品线从英特尔处理器转向自家定制芯片的计划，这标志着 Mac 历史上最成功的时期之一的开始。

## 转型背景与初期发布
*   **宣布时间**：2020 年 6 月，在多年传闻之后，苹果正式公布了这一重大转型计划。
*   **首次发布**：同年晚些时候，首批搭载 Apple 芯片的 Mac 机型发布，包括 13 英寸 MacBook Pro、MacBook Air 和 Mac mini。
*   **技术基础**：苹果凭借十多年制造 iPhone 和 iPad 芯片的经验，将 Mac 从 x86 架构转向了 Arm 架构。

## Apple 芯片带来的变革
苹果承诺并实现了 Mac 在每瓦性能方面的行业领先水平，带来了多项显著改进：
*   **卓越的能效**：显著提升的能效减少了热量产生，使得 MacBook Air 能够移除风扇，实现超薄设计。
*   **性能提升**：Apple 芯片以远低于高端英特尔 Mac 的价格，提供了强大的性能和出色的能效。
*   **用户体验优化**：
    *   Mac 经历了“复兴”，变得“比以往任何时候都更强大、更有能力”。
    *   苹果重新引入了 HDMI 和 MagSafe 等端口，提升了实用性。
    *   与 2010 年代中期 MacBook 存在的蝶式键盘故障、噪音大、发热严重等问题相比，Mac 的用户体验得到了极大改善。

## 苹果高管评价
苹果 CEO 蒂姆·库克（Tim Cook）表示：“凭借其强大的功能和行业领先的性能，Apple 芯片将使 Mac 比以往任何时候都更强大、更有能力。” 他还补充道：“我从未对 Mac 的未来如此兴奋。”

## 未来展望
*   **macOS 兼容性**：苹果近期宣布 macOS Tahoe 将是最后一个兼容基于英特尔 Mac 的 macOS 版本。
*   **游戏规则改变者**：库克强调，Mac 始终拥抱重大变革以保持在个人计算领域的前沿，而 Apple 芯片的推出“彻底改变了 Mac 的游戏规则”。

![Apple Silicon Feature Image](https://images.macrumors.com/t/e45xxP-1iheBkZk712RJsDDrNi4=/400x0/article-new/2023/11/apple-silicon-1-feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 五年前，苹果宣布 Mac 产品线从英特尔转向自家 Apple 芯片，开启了 Mac 的“复兴”时期。这一转型利用苹果在移动芯片上的经验，将 Mac 从 x86 架构转向 Arm，实现了行业领先的每瓦性能和卓越能效。新芯片显著提升了 Mac 的性能和用户体验，解决了旧款英特尔 Mac 的痛点，并重新引入了实用端口，使 Mac 变得更强大、更具竞争力。macOS Tahoe 将是最后一个支持英特尔 Mac 的版本。
items.translated_title: Mac 转向 Apple 芯片的过渡于五年前公布
items.content:
Apple silicon was announced five years ago this week, kickstarting one of the most successful periods for the Mac ever.


Following years of rumors, Apple in June 2020 unveiled its plan to transition the entire Mac lineup from Intel processors to its own custom-designed chips.

Later that year saw the release of the first three Mac models powered by Apple silicon, including a 13-inch MacBook Pro, MacBook Air, and Mac mini.

Apple had plenty of experience after a decade of making custom iPhone and iPad chips, and it was time for the Mac to switch from x86 to Arm architecture.

The company promised, and delivered, industry-leading performance per watt for Macs. This feat allowed it to remove the fan inside the MacBook Air, given the improved power efficiency resulted in less heat being generated in the ultra-thin laptop.

"With its powerful features and industry-leading performance, Apple silicon will make the Mac stronger and more capable than ever," said Apple CEO Tim Cook, in a press release announcing the transition to Apple silicon.

"I've never been more excited about the future of the Mac," added Cook.

He had good reason to be excited.

Over the past five years, many Apple fans would agree that the Mac has gone through a renaissance. Apple silicon delivered powerful performance and power efficiency at a fraction of the price of the highest-end Intel-based Macs. Apple also went a step further by bringing back ports like HDMI and MagSafe. In many ways, the Mac has never been in a better place, especially compared to the mid-2010s era when MacBooks were equipped with faulty butterfly keyboards, and often ran loud and hot to the touch.

Apple recently announced that macOS Tahoe will be the final macOS release that is compatible with Intel-based Macs.

"From the beginning, the Mac has always embraced big changes to stay at the forefront of personal computing," said Cook.

A big change was an understatement. Apple silicon completely changed the game for the Mac when it was first announced five years ago.
Tags: Apple Silicon, Intel

items.title: iOS 26 最佳和隐藏功能 (原标题: iOS 26 Best and Hidden Features)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26 最佳和隐藏功能概述

iOS 26 带来了数百项更新，包括重大改进和实用的小功能。以下是其中一些最值得关注的亮点：

### 最佳 iOS 26 功能

*   **视觉智能 (Visual Intelligence)**
    *   与截图结合使用，用户可以直接向 ChatGPT 提问关于屏幕内容的问题。
    *   支持在 Google 上搜索截图中的物品。

*   **信息 (Messages)**
    *   获得重大更新，支持自定义背景、群组聊天投票和打字指示器。
    *   新增实时翻译功能，方便与不同语言的用户交流。

*   **电话 (Phone)**
    *   **来电筛选 (Call Screening)**：在接通电话前，系统会询问来电者的姓名和来电原因。
    *   **等待协助 (Hold Assist)**：自动等待人工客服，用户无需听恼人的等待音乐。

*   **自动混音 (AutoMix)**
    *   Apple Music 中的新功能，通过时间拉伸和节拍混音，实现歌曲间的无缝过渡，提供类似 DJ 的体验。

*   **到访地点 (Visited Places)**
    *   地图应用中的新功能，可记录用户到访过的地方。
    *   方便用户在旅行中回顾并再次访问曾去过的优秀餐厅等地点。

*   **游戏 (Games)**
    *   全新的游戏应用，集中管理所有手机游戏，并方便发现新游戏。
    *   整合 Game Center 功能，支持与朋友挑战。

### 隐藏的 iOS 26 功能

*   **电池 (Battery)**
    *   新增实用功能，可显示手机充满电所需的时间。

*   **自适应省电模式 (Adaptive Power Mode)**
    *   一种新选项，可在手机电池使用量增加时（如使用地图或拍摄大量照片）节省电量。
    *   会通知用户电池使用量增加，并帮助用户削减不必要的功能以延长电池续航。
    *   据报道，此模式仅在特定 iPhone 型号上可用，并会进行“小的性能调整”。

*   **闹钟小睡 (Alarm Snooze)**
    *   现在可以自定义闹钟的小睡时间，不再局限于九分钟。

*   **专辑封面 (Album Artwork)**
    *   在锁屏界面播放 Apple Music、Spotify 等服务的歌曲时，专辑封面现在会全屏显示。

*   **空间场景 (Spatial Scenes)**
    *   照片应用中的有趣新功能，可将 2D 图像添加 3D 效果。

*   **Apple Music 翻译 (Apple Music Translation)**
    *   在 Apple Music 中听歌时，如果歌词是其他语言，现在可以实时查看翻译。

### 其他 iOS 26 改进和新功能

*   **控制中心设计修复 (Control Center Design Fixes)**
    *   在 iOS 26 Beta 2 中，控制中心按钮变得更加不透明，背景模糊度增加，提高了在多色背景下的可见性。

*   **新 Wi-Fi 功能 (New Wi-Fi Features)**
    *   新增 Captive Assist 和 Wi-Fi Aware 两项 Wi-Fi 功能。Captive Assist 已在代码中发现，但尚未启用。

*   **表情符号游戏 (Emoji Game)**
    *   美国和加拿大地区的 Apple News+ 订阅用户可以玩一款新的表情符号游戏，任务是使用表情符号完成单词和短语。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26引入多项重大更新。主要功能包括：视觉智能（截图提问ChatGPT）、增强版信息应用（实时翻译、投票）、电话应用（来电筛选、等待协助）。Apple Music新增AutoMix和歌词翻译。地图增加“到访地点”，并有全新游戏应用。此外，还包括电池管理（充电时间、自适应省电模式）、可自定义闹钟小睡、全屏锁屏专辑封面、照片空间场景、新Wi-Fi功能及控制中心设计优化。
items.content:
There are hundreds of changes in iOS 26, some of which are huge updates and some of which are smaller. We've rounded up two lists, one featuring the best features ‌iOS 26‌ has to offer, and one that includes some of the smaller but still useful changes that are available.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

Best iOS 26 Features



  • Visual Intelligence - In ‌iOS 26‌, Visual Intelligence works with screenshots, so you can ask ChatGPT questions about what's on your screen, or search for items in screenshots on Google.

  • Messages - The Messages app got a major update, and it supports custom backgrounds, polls, and typing indicators for group texts, and even Live Translation if you're chatting with someone that speaks a different language

  • Phone - The Phone app has a feature that will screen your calls, asking callers for their name and reason for calling before they can speak to you. There's also Hold Assist that'll wait for a live agent for you, so you don't need to listen to annoying hold music.

  • AutoMix - AutoMix in Apple Music is a new feature that can seamlessly transition from one song to another with time stretching and beat mixing. It's like a DJ in your pocket.

  • Visited Places - In the Maps app, there's a new Visited Places feature that keeps track of where you've been. If you're on vacation and visit a great restaurant, but don't happen to remember what it was called, you can check in the Maps app so you can visit again.

  • Games - There's an all-new Games app that houses all of your mobile games, and makes it easy to find new ones. It also includes Game Center functionality and features so you can challenge your friends.


Hidden iOS 26 Features



  • Battery - There's a useful new battery feature that lets you know how long it will be until your phone is fully charged.

  • Adaptive Power Mode - Adaptive Power Mode is a new option that can save battery when you're using more battery life on your phone. Maybe you're using Maps more, or taking a lot of photos. It'll let you know your battery usage is up, and will help you trim down features you don't need so that your battery lasts as long as it normally does.

  • Alarm Snooze - When you set an alarm, you can now customize the snooze time. No more nine minute snoozes.

  • Album artwork - When you play songs from ‌Apple Music‌, Spotify, and other services, album artwork is now full screen on the Lock Screen.

  • Spatial Scenes - Spatial Scenes are a fun new Photos feature that takes your 2D images and adds a 3D feel to them.

  • Apple Music Translation - When you're listening to a song in ‌Apple Music‌ and there are lyrics in another language, you can now see real-time translations.


Do you agree with our picks? Know of a hidden feature we didn't mention? Let us know in the comments below.
This article, "iOS 26 Best and Hidden Features" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 2 中的所有新功能 (原标题: Everything New in iOS 26 Beta 2)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26 Beta 2 中的所有新功能

苹果于2025年6月23日向开发者发布了iOS 26的第二个测试版，这是自WWDC主题演讲后新操作系统首次亮相以来，引入的首批更改和优化。由于仍处于早期测试阶段，iOS 26进行了不少调整，以下是主要更新概览。

## 主要更新概览

*   **控制中心 (Control Center)**
    *   Liquid Glass控制中心按钮的背景模糊效果增强，使其外观更不透明，内容比之前更容易看清。
    *   ![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![iOS 26 控制中心 Beta 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/UhL_KPOzAcTX9vaDlgmn0oQ0xPs=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-control-center-b2.jpg?lossy)
    *   （左侧为iOS 26 Beta 1，右侧为iOS 26 Beta 2）

*   **降低透明度 (Reduce Transparency)**
    *   “设置”应用中“辅助功能”下的“降低透明度”选项现在能进一步减少Liquid Glass的透明度。
    *   ![iOS 26 降低透明度](https://images.macrumors.com/t/i1uzpxYe_MYAK2dULaxRJozObM0=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-reduce-transparency.jpg?lossy)
    *   （左侧为iOS 26 Beta 1，右侧为iOS 26 Beta 2）

*   **Safari 浏览器**
    *   在标签管理视图中，新增标签按钮（“+”号）的位置发生了变化。它现在位于左下角，与iOS 18保持一致，而非iOS 26 Beta 1中的左上角。
    *   紧凑型标签栏现在也提供了前进和后退选项。
    *   ![Safari 设计更改 iOS 26 Beta 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/8bxLKyJUxo5vYAebTQ9NoGfqFIs=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/safari-design-changes-ios-26-b2.jpg?lossy)
    *   （左侧为Beta 2中的Safari，右侧为Beta 1中的Safari）

*   **App Store**
    *   App Store的产品页面新增了“辅助功能”部分。开发者需要提供其应用支持的辅助功能详情，以便填充此部分内容。
    *   ![App Store 辅助功能 iOS 26 Beta 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/oV9T7v8whvwqCNNCi2oWN7GgAmM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/app-store-accessibility-ios-26-b2.jpg?lossy)

*   **钱包 (Wallet)**
    *   iOS 26 Beta 2全面支持苹果在WWDC上宣布的订单追踪功能。
    *   在“钱包”应用中，新增了一个选项，允许Siri扫描“邮件”应用以查找所有商家订单和邮件，即使这些订单不是通过Apple Pay完成的。
    *   ![iOS 26 订单追踪 钱包](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0VITCiS-vREVEIFmmOcb8dL20XY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-order-tracking-wallet.jpg?lossy)

*   **新铃声**
    *   “Reflection”铃声新增了一个“Alt 1”选项。用户可以在“设置”>“声音与触感”>“铃声”中选择。
    *   ![铃声 Alt 1 iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/joaRnEJuJP5blyA4WncW5YDQrbM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ringtone-alt-1-ios-26.jpg?lossy)

*   **广播小组件 (Radio Widget)**
    *   新增了一个“实时广播 Apple Music”小组件。
    *   ![iOS 26 实时广播](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ivLfXCyCBSTicmLVmuJ6Xk8_iTc=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-live-radio.jpg?lossy)

*   **低电量模式 (Low Power Mode)**
    *   低电量模式的描述得到了改进，更清晰地说明了其作用。它会暂时减少部分后台活动、处理速度、显示刷新率和亮度，并限制某些功能，如5G、iCloud同步、邮件获取等。此前，该设置仅提及减少后台活动如下载和邮件获取。

*   **实时字幕 (Live Captions)**
    *   “转录通话”选项现在更名为“保存通话转录”。
    *   该功能明确指出，在转录开始前会通过声音通知通话参与者。
    *   ![iOS 26 实时字幕](https://images.macrumors.com/t/_XiwBB70NbjX03I-n2Fp6IpgQbM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-live-captions.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 2带来了多项改进。控制中心背景模糊度增加，降低透明度选项效果更强。Safari浏览器新增标签按钮移至左下角，并为紧凑型标签栏添加了前进/后退选项。App Store产品页新增辅助功能区。钱包应用全面支持订单追踪，Siri可扫描邮件查找订单。新增“Alt 1”铃声和实时广播Apple Music小组件。低电量模式描述更清晰。实时字幕的“转录通话”更名为“保存通话转录”，并会在开始前通知参与者。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 Beta 2 中的所有新功能
items.content:
Apple provided developers with the second beta of iOS 26, introducing the first changes and refinements to the new operating system since it debuted after the WWDC keynote. Because we're early in the beta testing process, there are quite a few tweaks to ‌iOS 26‌, which we've rounded up below.


Control Center


The background behind the Liquid Glass Control Center buttons has more blur, allowing for a more opaque look that makes everything easier to see than before.

‌iOS 26‌ beta 1 on left, ‌iOS 26‌ beta 2 on right

Reduce Transparency


The Reduce Transparency option under Accessibility in the Settings app now cuts down on the Liquid Glass transparency even more.

‌iOS 26‌ beta 1 on left, ‌iOS 26‌ beta 2 on right

Safari


In Safari, Apple changed the location of the new tab button in the tab management view. The "+" button for adding a new tab is now located in the bottom left as it is in iOS 18, rather than the upper left as it was in ‌iOS 26‌ beta 1.

Safari in beta 2 on left, Safari in beta 1 on right

With the Compact tab bar, there are also now both back and forward options.

App Store


In the App Store, Apple added an Accessibility section to product pages. Developers will need to provide details listing the accessibility features they support for this section in the ‌App Store‌ to be populated.


Wallet


‌iOS 26‌ beta 2 adds full support for the order tracking feature that Apple announced at WWDC. In the Wallet app, there is an option to let Siri to scan your Mail app to find all orders and emails from merchants, even if those orders weren't made with Apple Pay.


New Ringtone


There's a new "Alt 1" ringtone option for the Reflection ringtone. You can choose it as your ringtone by going to the Settings app, tapping on Sounds and Haptics, tapping on Ringtone, and then choosing Alt 1 under Reflection.


Radio Widget


There is a new Live Radio Apple Music widget.


Low Power Mode


Apple has improved the description for Low Power Mode, making it clearer what it does.
iPhone will temporarily reduce some background activities, processing speed, display refresh rate and brightness, and limit certain features such as 5G, iCloud syncing, mail fetch, and more.

Before now, the setting only mentioned reducing background activity like downloads and mail fetch.

Live Captions


For Live Captions, the Transcribe Calls option is now Save Call Transcripts, and the feature makes it clear that it will inform call participants with a sound before transcribing begins.


Read More


For an overview of the features in ‌iOS 26‌, make sure to check out our iOS 26 roundup. We also have a roundup of iPadOS 26 features.

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 2 扩展了钱包应用中的订单追踪支持 (原标题: iOS 26 Beta 2 Expands Support for Order Tracking in Wallet)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26 Beta 2：钱包应用订单追踪功能增强

苹果于2025年6月23日发布的iOS 26 Beta 2版本，全面支持了此前在WWDC上宣布的订单追踪功能，显著提升了钱包应用（Wallet app）的用户体验。

## 核心功能与改进

*   **邮件扫描集成**：新版本允许Siri扫描用户的邮件应用（Mail app），以查找并整合来自各类商家的所有订单和邮件，即使这些订单并非通过Apple Pay完成支付。
*   **功能扩展**：此前，钱包应用中的订单追踪功能仅限于通过Apple Pay完成的订单。虽然iOS 26的初始测试版已部分支持此功能，但其功能性仍受限。现在，钱包应用能够利用Apple Intelligence技术扫描用户的电子邮件，并自动提取所有近期订单的邮件信息。

## 操作与设置

*   **访问方式**：用户可以在钱包应用中，点击“...”按钮，然后选择“订单”（Orders）选项来访问和查看所有追踪的订单。
*   **隐私控制**：通过设备端智能（on-device intelligence）扫描邮件应用的功能是可选加入（opt-in）的，用户可以自行决定是否启用此功能。

## 可用性与兼容性

*   **测试版发布**：目前，iOS 26 Beta 2仅面向开发者提供。公共测试版预计将于七月向公众发布。
*   **硬件要求**：此订单追踪功能将需要一台支持Apple Intelligence的iPhone设备才能使用。

![iOS 26 钱包订单追踪](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0VITCiS-vREVEIFmmOcb8dL20XY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ios-26-order-tracking-wallet.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 2全面增强了钱包应用的订单追踪功能。现在，它能利用Apple Intelligence扫描邮件，追踪所有商家订单，无论是否通过Apple Pay支付。此功能需用户选择开启，并要求支持Apple Intelligence的iPhone设备。目前版本仅供开发者使用，公共测试版预计七月发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 Beta 2 扩展了钱包应用中的订单追踪支持
items.content:
iOS 26 beta 2 adds full support for the order tracking feature that Apple announced at WWDC. In the Wallet app, there is an option to let Siri scan your Mail app to find all orders and emails from merchants, even if those orders weren't made with Apple Pay.


The Wallet app previously had an order tracking feature, but it was only an option when an order was made using ‌Apple Pay‌.

Order tracking was partially working in the initial ‌iOS 26‌ beta, but the functionality was limited. The Wallet app is now able to scan your email and pull in all recent order emails with Apple Intelligence.

In the Wallet app, orders can be accessed by tapping on the "..." button and choosing the "Orders" option. Using on-device intelligence to scan the Mail app is opt-in.

‌iOS 26‌ is limited to developers right now, but a beta will be made available to public beta testers in July. The order tracking option will require an iPhone that supports ‌Apple Intelligence‌.
This article, "iOS 26 Beta 2 Expands Support for Order Tracking in Wallet" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 2 中发现 iPhone 17 Air 的迹象 (原标题: Signs of iPhone 17 Air Spotted in iOS 26 Beta 2)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26 Beta 2 中发现 iPhone 17 Air 的迹象

iOS 26 的第二个测试版中发现了暗示一款新显示屏尺寸 iPhone 存在的线索，这可能就是预计今年秋季发布的 iPhone 17 Air。

## 关键发现

*   **分辨率线索**：Macworld 在 iOS 经典小丑鱼壁纸的一个版本中，发现其分辨率为 "420x912@3x"，这转换为实际分辨率为 1260 x 2736 像素。
*   **尺寸匹配**：该分辨率与目前任何已上市的 iPhone 型号都不匹配，但与我们对 iPhone 17 Air 的预期尺寸非常相似。
*   **分析师预测**：去年，苹果分析师郭明錤曾指出，苹果新款超薄 iPhone 17 型号将配备 6.6 英寸显示屏，分辨率约为 1260 x 2740 像素，这与在测试版中发现的数据非常接近。
*   **发布时间**：考虑到 iPhone 17 系列机型预计将于今年 9 月发布并预装 iOS 26，该壁纸很可能是为苹果计划今年发布的新设备设计的。

## iPhone 17 Air 传闻特性

*   **显示屏尺寸**：iPhone 17 Air 将配备 6.6 英寸显示屏。
*   **相对尺寸**：其尺寸将小于 iPhone 17 Pro，但大于标准版 iPhone 17。
*   **超薄机身**：有传言称其机身将极其纤薄，厚度可能在 5.5 毫米左右。
*   **其他功能**：其他传闻中的功能包括苹果的 C1 调制解调器和单镜头后置摄像头。

![iPhone 17 Air Size Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/tsS7__6khINqvHPio2T8QC6mkrY=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/iPhone-17-Air-Size-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 2 代码中发现新显示屏尺寸线索，暗示可能存在 iPhone 17 Air。Macworld 发现的壁纸分辨率 1260 x 2736 与传闻中 6.6 英寸、超薄的 iPhone 17 Air 相符。该设备预计今年秋季随 iPhone 17 系列发布，可能配备 C1 调制解调器和单摄。
items.translated_title: iOS 26 Beta 2 中发现 iPhone 17 Air 的迹象
items.content:
The second beta of iOS 26 hints at the existence of an iPhone with a new display size, perhaps the iPhone 17 Air that's expected this fall.


Macworld found a version of the classic iOS clownfish wallpaper with a "420x912@3x" resolution, which translates to a 1260 x 2736 resolution. That does not match the resolution of any ‌iPhone‌ that's available now, but it is similar in size to what we're expecting for the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌.

Last year, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggested Apple's new ultra slim iPhone 17 model would feature a 6.6-inch display with a resolution of approximately 1260 x 2740, which is close to what was found in the beta.

With the ‌iPhone 17‌ models set to come out in September with ‌iOS 26‌ pre-installed, it seems likely that the wallpaper is designed for the all-new device that Apple plans or release this year.

With a 6.6-inch display size, the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌ will be smaller than the iPhone 17 Pro and larger than the standard ‌iPhone 17‌. It will have a super thin chassis, which rumors suggest could measure in at around 5.5mm. Other rumored features include Apple's C1 modem and a single-lens rear camera.
